00003 import net.rim.device.api.system.Display;
00004 import net.rim.device.api.ui.Graphics;
00005 import net.rim.device.api.ui.component.EditField;

00007 public class CustomEditField extends EditField {
00008         
00009     private int iRectX = getFont().getAdvance(getLabel());
00010     private int iRectWidth = Display.getWidth() - iRectX - 4;
00011     private int iRectHeight = 20;
00012     
00013     public CustomEditField(String _label, String _initialValue)
00014     {
00015         super(_label, _initialValue);
00016     }
00017 
00018     public CustomEditField(String _label, String _initialValue, int _max_char, int _height, long _style)
00019     {
00020         super(_label, _initialValue, _max_char, _style);
00021         iRectHeight = _height;
00022     }
00023     
00024     public int getPreferredWidth() {
00025         return Display.getWidth();
00026    }
00027 
00028     public int getPreferredHeight() {
00029         return iRectHeight;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public void layout(int width, int height) {
00033         super.layout(width, getPreferredHeight());
00034         setExtent(width, getPreferredHeight());
00035     }
00036             
00037     public void paint(Graphics g) {
00038         g.setColor(0x000000);
00039         g.drawRect(iRectX, 0, iRectWidth, iRectHeight);
00040         super.paint(g);
00041     }
